subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A.  player Lorenzen Wright, whose body was found in the woods outside Memphis, was shot to death, and the case is being investigated as a homicide, the police said Thursday.
snippet: The former N.B.A.  player Lorenzen Wright, whose body was found in the woods outside Memphis, was shot to death, and the case is being investigated as a homicide, the police said Thursday.
